title: Would a Jumbo-Visma and Soudal Quick-Step Merger Destroy Pro Cycling?
content:
What are the implications of a deal? Will a new 'super team' lift the entire peloton? Or is it time for some budget rules? We dive in.

Read the full article at Would a Jumbo-Visma and Soudal Quick-Step Merger Destroy Pro Cycling? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
